meta.description: My Boards appears too late in sidebar so we need to have a separate trigger for this.
meta.flag: > div > div.board-drawer-content > div.js-boards-list-container > div.js-all-boards > div > p > span.icon-sm.icon-board

html.My_Boards: > div > div.board-drawer-content > div.js-boards-list-container > div.js-all-boards > div:nth-child(1) > p > span.sidebar-section-header-title

title.Collapse_section_: div > div.board-drawer-content > div.js-boards-list-container > div > div > p > span.js-collapse-section
title.Expand_section_: div > div.board-drawer-content > div.js-boards-list-container > div > div > p > span.js-expand-section
